title: Ep 47: Cruelty-Free, Vegan Beauty with Leaping Bunny's Kim Paschen
itunes:title: Ep 47: Cruelty-Free, Vegan Beauty with Leaping Bunny's Kim Paschen
itunes:subtitle: Leaping Bunny program director Kim Paschen schools us on the state of cruelty-free beauty—and exactly what to know to be a more compassionate customer. Before that, Jess is feeling the London hair scene; Jenn has a special gift for our Fat Mascara...
description:
Leaping Bunny program director Kim Paschen schools us on the state of cruelty-free beauty—and exactly what to know to be a more compassionate customer. Before that, Jess is feeling the London hair scene; Jenn has a special gift for our Fat Mascara listeners (!); and we discuss the beauty benefits of meditation. Ohmmmm.....

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
